title: Vice President Biden Hosts Conference Calls with Governors and Local Officials to Discuss Recovery Act Implementation | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




April 02, 2009

 



Vice President Biden Hosts Conference Calls with Governors and Local Officials to Discuss Recovery Act Implementation




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Vice President  _____________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                       April 2, 2009  VICE PRESIDENT BIDEN HOSTS CONFERENCE CALLS WITH GOVERNORS AND LOCAL OFFICIALS TO DISCUSS RECOVERY ACT IMPLEMENTATION   Earlier today, the Vice President hosted two conference calls with Governors and Mayors/County Executives from across the country to discuss Recovery Act implementation.   The following elected officials participated:  GOVERNORS     Governor Steve Beshear (D-KY) Governor Mitch Daniels (R-IN) Governor Bill Ritter (D-CO) Governor Michael Rounds (R-SD) Governor Ted Strickland (D-OH)    MAYORS / COUNTY EXECUTIVES   Mayor Greg Ballard (R), Indianapolis, IN Mayor David Cicilline (D), Providence, RI Mayor Frank Cownie (D), Des Moines, IA Mayor Frank Jackson (D), Cleveland, OH Mayor Pat McCrory (R), Charlotte, NC Mayor Mike Ragsdale (R), Knox County, TN Chair of County Commission, Judge Glen Whitley (R), Tarrant County, TX
